item.title: Oleg Marichev: On the occasion of the eightieth anniversary
item.description: arXiv:2509.25246v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: September 7, 2025 marked the 80th anniversary of the birth of Oleg Marichev. Marichev is known mathematician which has developed many of Mathematica's algorithms for the calculation of definite and indefinite integrals and hypergeometric functions including Meijer G-function.
item.dc:creator: S. N. Askhabov, V. Kiryakova, V. V. Kravchenko, C. P. Li, Yu. Luchko, S. V. Rogosin, S. M. Sitnik, E. L. Shishkina, Vu Kim Tuan
